Prepositions:
  Time (at, on, in)
  Place (under, over)
  Direction (into, onto)
  Cause (because of, due to)
  Purpose (for, to)
  Agent (by)
  Complex Prepositions (in front of, on behalf of)
  (LGG) Hybrid Connectives (since, after)

common:
